title: Thunderlords Decree

replies.body:
they buffed keystones in 6.1. If you read the changes, fervor is actually pretty good on a lot of people now and tanks will be going grasp now more than likely.

They are nerfing Thunderlords next patch too, so it will be less viable on certain champions.

Most of the masteries are actually really good now. 
Warlord's is still great on Yasuo/Tryn and a large majority of all the AD Carries
Fervor is great on auto based melee champions. 
Deathfire's is good for Brand/Cass/Malz/Swain and sometimes Fizz. 
The movement speed one is good on Talon and Diana.
Thunderlord's is still viable on pretty much everyone.
Windspeaker's is still super great on Janna/Nami/Lulu/Raka etc.
Grasp is great on all tanks (Especially health tanks)
SotA is super great with Cinderhulk junglers
Bond of Stone is perfect for Tank Supports.
